### Phytophthora outbreaks following supplementary juniper planting in northern England and Scotland

This section will describe Flora's models and could include interactive maps of *P. austrocedri* at juniper sites, risk factors for disease and supplementary planting layers. Plus a link to the questions Flora would like to put to her stakeholders.
